channel.title: Music Cars on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Music Cars on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: tron
item.description: This game rules. It is the tron cars. So so fun. what a great lunchtime game ;). I should probably get that movie t some time. so I got a new plugin for winamp that tracks what you listen to and then analyzes it and creates a “good” playlist for you that fits your music taste. however, it has to be trained. and I don’t want to train it. so I am training it by listening to music.
